module.name: Asterisk SIP Settings
module.description: Use to configure Various Asterisk SIP Settings in the General section of sip.conf. Also includes an auto-configuration tool to determine NAT settings. The module assumes Asterisk version 1.4 or higher. Some settings may not exist in Asterisk 1.2 and will be ignored by Asterisk.
module.changelog: *14.0.25.5* FREEPBX-12824 - Move the Video codec section from Chan_SIP tab to General SIP Settings tab. Move Non-Standard g726 and T38 Pass-Through to General SIP Settings tab. *13.0.25.4* FREEPBX-16429 - unable to collect the IP address of tun interface *13.0.25.3* FREEPBX-16391 Fix: Local Networks - Blank fields will not be ignored. Improving test for field - black list &candidate. *13.0.25.2* FREEPBX-16383 Fix: Checking the content of ip and subnet mak in Asterisk Sip Settings - General. *13.0.25.1* Fix PJSip Transport name on SNG7 *13.0.25* Backend TLS changes *13.0.24.10* FREEPBX-15190 fix spelling mistakes *13.0.24.9* Add ability to set ice_blacklist and ice_host_candidates for webrtc nat issues *13.0.24.8* FREEPBX-13792 *13.0.24.7* FREEPBX-15210 Work around *13.0.24.6* Check Asterisk version if it doesnt exist *13.0.24.5* FREEPBX-11978 Firefox window jumps *13.0.24.4* FREEPBX-14371 Consider rewording tool tip for chan_sip bind port *13.0.24.3* FREEPBX-13686 Jbresyncthreshold must be a non-negative integer Error *13.0.24.2* FREEPBX-12975 - Fix PJSIP Not returning port numbers *13.0.24* FREEPBX-13522 Define STUN/TURN servers separately from Asterisk *13.0.23.12* FREEPBX-13223 if tcpenable is already installed *13.0.23.11* FREEPBX-13223 TCP chan_sip settings populate correctly *13.0.23.10* FREEPBX-13022 FREEPBX-13153 missing settings in sipsettings that were removed from core *13.0.23.9* Fix callerid name for Unknown calls *13.0.23.8* Add Enable TCP button in Chan_SIP *13.0.24.7* FREEPBX-12870 set default context *13.0.24.6* FREEPBX-12730 - Fix invalid resolve link *13.0.24.5* FREEPBX-12439 wording fixes *13.0.24.4* FREEPBX-12427 conform to RFC for default ports *13.0.23.2* #12394 *13.0.23.1* #10539, #12264 and associated issues *13.0.22* FREEPBX-12273 use correct TLS setting for pjsip *13.0.21.3* Use proper TLS binding for chan_sip *13.0.20* Set TLS ports during upgrade *13.0.19* Full certificate manager support FREEPBX-11057 *13.0.18* FREEPBX-11560 check main page for IP before complaining on chansip *13.0.17* #11483 and #11439 *13.0.16.1* TLS Fixes *13.0.15* FREEPBX-11029 options when configuring Fax Passthrough *13.0.14.3* FREEPBX-9961 ignore mising route binary problems, FREEPBX-10176 remove class on add local network *13.0.14.2* FREEPBX-10084 fixes and FREEPBX-9961 some work *13.0.14.1* Fix missing btn class on a button *13.0.14* FREEPBX-9962 grammar, FREEPBX-9961 more error tolerant ip checking *13.0.13* FREEPBX-9956 Cannot change Asterisk SIP setting *13.0.12* Invalid looping *13.0.11* Fix bug introduced in 13.0.9 *13.0.10* FREEPBX-9697 consolidate all javascript to fix bugs and clean up *13.0.9* Better getBinds settings *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9737 Bring values in line with patch for FREEPBX-6518 handle all settings for Asterisk 11.5+ *13.0.7* Fix weird timeouts during apply changes in sip settings *13.0.6* Move to tab navigation *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9697 FREEPBX-9487 Audio Codecs Tooltip not Visible *13.0.1alpha6* Move language to custom fields. *13.0.1alpha5* Fix installer *13.0.1alpha4* FREEPBX-9263 fixing general errors *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-8859 netmask optional *12.0.4* #8061 - Let IP addresses for NAT be inherited properly. *12.0.3* #7971 - Return the 'Detect External IP' button *12.0.2* Fixes the few remaining bugs *12.0.1alpha7* Provide a bar when settings change *12.0.1alpha2* Hide PJSIP when disabled or not present in the system *12.0.1alpha1* PJSipsettings and Generalize and breakout the page for sub-navigation *2.11.0.9* update license file *2.11.0.7* rtp.conf cleanup, require this module *2.11.0.6* #6473 - check t38pt_udptl value before setting in sip_general_additional.conf *2.11.0.5* More fixes related to rtpstart and rtpend values *2.11.0.4* Fixes to missing rtpstart and rtpend values. They will always be added now. *2.11.0.3* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.3 *2.11.0.2* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.2 *2.11.0.1* Adds rtp controlled settings (rtpstart,rtpend), re #6397 *2.11.0.0* #6019
